credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 9 13/16 x 6 1/4 in. (25 x 15.8 cm)
rim: 2 5/8 in. (6.7 cm)
circumference: 19 5/8 in. (49.9 cm)
title: Large Flask
description: Thin, natural light-green glass. Broad, rounded body. Tall, flaring neck constricted at base. Fire-polished rim. Fine, plain thread of glass wound around middle of neck nine times. Wide concave base. Vessel somewhat lopsided. No pontil-mark. Iridescent film, some milky-white weathering.
